knimeNode.name: Keras Maximum Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that takes the element-wise maximum of two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that takes the element-wise maximum of two inputs. Corresponds to the Maximum Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Maximum layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Maximum layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Maximum layer.
